SCHOOL_SELECT.SELECT_TO_CONTINUE: Select up to 3 dream schools to continue

USER_GOALS.GOALS_INFO: The SAT test includes 2 section scores, each with a score range of 200-800. The range of the total score is 400-1600. You can change your target score at any time.
